channel.title: Call of Duty: World at War - Map Pack 3
channel.description:
I wasn't actually going to buy this, but a few of the people that I play with managed to convince me to get it, so I ended up doing so, and then convincing Rich to get it. :P To start, I'll say that I definitely bought this map pack not for the online multiplayer maps, but for the zombie map (Der Riese).
The multiplayer maps are good, the only one I have a particular disliking to is Breach; the other two - Battery and Revolution - have rather good ideas and have interesting themes to them.
Der Riese is a zombie factory, in this map you now have the ability to teleport, and even upgrade your weapons. The great thing about the map packs is that you get everything in the previous map pack, plus more. After the levels get higher, upgrading your gun (which costs 5000 points) is almost mandatory if you wish to stay alive. The map pack also introduces a new special grenade; the monkey bomb, which attracts attention of the zombies and they all run around it (a lot like the flashy-type-thingy from Left 4 Dead) and then it finally explodes. Another new addition is the Bowie Knife; an extremely powerful knife that has the ability to 1-hit at round 15. The regular knife takes 2-hits to kill at round 2.
As a final conclusion, this zombie map is absolutely exhilarating, the fun you have on this zombie map is ridiculous, and the level of intensity is insane. I encourage anyone who has the game to go buy this map pack. Below, I have pasted how far I've gotten, and if anyone wants any tips, just ask.
Round 22 - 2 Players Round 22 - 4 Players [b][u]Round 29 - 3 Players[/u][/b]

item.title: Call of Duty: World at War - Map Pack 3
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:14, topic:295545”][quote author=Tico link=topic=391536.msg2915916#msg2915916 date=1250405818]
The great thing about the map packs is that you get everything in the previous map pack, plus more.
[/quote]
Are you saying that if you buy the third map pack you get the ones before it too? No way…[/quote]

He means you are able to do everything in those map packs in here…like the bloodhounds in map pack 2 are also in 3 etc.

item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

nohope:

camp at the teleporter in the building by the fly trap in the teleporter room ttwo people get door 2 people get windows andybody want to join me on live?

We actually hide on the top of the stairs as seen in this youtube video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DcFSphWmuko

It is by far the best spot to defend.

@blitz: XBL.

[quote=“Tico, post:1, topic:295545”]I wasn’t actually going to buy this, but a few of the people that I play with managed to convince me to get it, so I ended up doing so, and then convincing Rich to get it. To start, I’ll say that I definitely bought this map pack not for the online multiplayer maps, but for the zombie map (Der Riese).

Der Riese is a zombie factory, in this map you now have the ability to teleport, and even upgrade your weapons. After the levels get higher, upgrading your gun (which costs 5000 points) is almost mandatory if you wish to stay alive. The map pack also introduces a new special grenade; the monkey bomb, which attracts attention of the zombies and they all run around it (a lot like the flashy-type-thingy from Left 4 Dead) and then it finally explodes. Another new addition is the Bowie Knife; an extremely powerful knife that has the ability to 1-hit at round 15. The regular knife takes 2-hits to kill at round 2.

As a final conclusion, this zombie map is absolutely exhilarating, the fun you have on this zombie map is ridiculous, and the level of intensity is insane. I encourage anyone who has the game to go buy this map pack. Below, I have pasted how far I’ve gotten, and if anyone wants any tips, just ask.

Round 22 - 2 Players
Round 22 - 4 Players
Round 29 - 3 Players[/quote]
I just so happened to get to Round 29 with 3 people.

XBL or PS3?

item.title: Call of Duty: World at War - Map Pack 3
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

the maps are good, but the multiplayer is fucking terrible, which is why the game is basically good just for playing zombies

Tico:

Yeah, we just finished our best score so far, (Round 29) and it took us 3 hours; well worth the time spent (but mind you, we had crawlers and we were running around playing with the box/upgrading and such).

we spent like 1 hour just camping at the box for upgraded ray guns/brownings (we ended up getting at least 15 teddy bears)

Read full topic

My buddy just bought it and we played a few games of it at his house then he brought his hard drive over to my house,we only got to like round 14 though,we were just winging it.I’m planning to buy it as well tomorrow also the multiplayer maps aren’t that bad either and I hardly play CoD5.
